channel.title: github on MOHDUR
channel.description: Recent content in github on MOHDUR

item.title: Pobranie ostatniego wydania programu z repozytorium Github
item.description: Pobranie wersji binarnej 1#!/usr/bin/env bash 2 3curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/junegunn/fzf-bin/releases/latest \ 4 | grep browser_download_url \ 5 | grep linux-amd64 \ 6 | cut -d '"' -f 4 \ 7 | wget -O fzf-bin.tgz -qi - 8 9tar xf fzf-bin.tgz 10rm fzf-bin.tgz Pobranie źródeł 1#!/usr/bin/env bash 2 3curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/junegunn/fzf/releases/latest \ 4 | grep tarball_url \ 5 | cut -d '"' -f 4 \ 6 | wget -O fzf-src.tgz -qi - 7 8tar xf fzf-src.
